" A Photo Manager
Version AndroFotoFinder $versionName$
$about$

Minimal requirements: Android 4.0 (API 14), internet/wifi-connection to download geodata and a SD-Card to cache geodata and to store photos

Licence: GPLv3

Requred permissions:

  • INTERNET: to download map data from Open Streetmap Server
  • ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE and ACCESS_WIFI_STATE: to find out if wifi/internet is online to start downloading geodata if neccessary
  • WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE to cache downloaded map data in local file system and to do file operations.
  • READ_LOGS after app crash the logcat is written to /mnt/sdcard/copy/log/androFotofinder.logcat*.txt .

The code uses

  • osmdroid library to display maps from Open Street Map
  • chris bane's PhotoView that implemnts the zoomable image view
  • drew noakes metadata-extractor to display extended exif infos
  • slf4j logging for java with the https://github.com/lp0/slf4j-android driver
  • junit Testing support with Mockito

History

See also History for more details.
Version v0.4.2
  • Renamed from "a Foto Finder" to "a Photo Manager" to avoid naming collision with others.
  • Added Bookmark support to remember search kriteria.
  • Image-Detail-View: implemented slideshow, improved sliding/scaling
  • Improved Media scanner for android below 4.4 to directly update media database after file operations copy, rename, move, delete...
Version v0.4.1
  • Image-Detail-View: implemented Share/Edit/Rename/Delete/Copy/Move/change geo infos
  • Gallery-View in Multi selection mode: change geo infos
  • Geografic-Map: selected items as blue marker; current selection as red marker; "geo:" picker; long tap context menu
Version v0.4.0.150816
  • Gallery-View: implemented Multi selection mode: Share/Delete/Copy/Move/CreateFolder/Write-Log
Initial Version v0.3.4.150728
